Table of Contents

Interface ITodoListClient

Represents the client interface for TodoList SignalR hub. Defines about which actions in todo list the client can be notified about

Namespace: Realtime_ToDo_Web_API.Hubs

Methods

AddTask(TodoTask)

Notifies the client that a new task has been added to the todo list.

Parameters

task TodoTask

The task that was added.

Connected(int)

Notifies the client that they have successfully connected to a workspace.

Parameters

workspaceId int

The identifier of the connected workspace.

DeleteTask(int)

Notifies the client that a task has been deleted from the todo list.

Parameters

taskId int

The identifier of the task that was deleted.

Disconnected(int)

Notifies the client that they have been disconnected from a workspace.

Parameters

workspaceId int

The identifier of the disconnected workspace.

Error(string)

Notifies the client about an error that occurred.

Parameters

errorMessage string

The error message.

UpdateTask(TodoTask)

Notifies the client that an existing task in the todo list has been updated.

Parameters

newTask TodoTask

The updated task.

UpdateTaskCompleted(int, bool)

Notifies the client that the completion status of a task in the todo list has been updated.

Parameters

taskId int

The identifier of the task.

completed bool

The new completion status of the task.

UpdateTaskDeadline(int, DateTime?)

Notifies the client that the deadline of a task in the todo list has been updated.

Parameters

taskId int

The identifier of the task.

deadline DateTime?

The new deadline of the task.

UpdateTaskOrder(int, int)

Notifies the client that the order of a task in the todo list has been updated.

Parameters

taskId int

The identifier of the task.

order int

The new order of the task.

UpdateTaskTitle(int, string)

Notifies the client that the title of a task in the todo list has been updated.

Parameters

taskId int

The identifier of the task.

title string

The new title of the task.

UserConnected(int)

Notifies the client that new user have connected to a workspace.

Parameters

userCount int

Current number of connected users.

UserDisconnected(int)

Notifies the client that a user have dissconnected from a workspace.

Parameters

userCount int

Current number of connected users.
